current.message:
fix: Switch to Vercel adapter for proper Vercel deployment

- Install @astrojs/vercel package
- Update astro.config.mjs to use vercel adapter instead of node
- Enable Vercel web analytics
- This should resolve 404 deployment issues on Vercel platform

previous.message:
fix: Add packages/editor to git and update .gitignore for Vercel deployment

- Remove packages/editor from .gitignore to allow it to be committed
- Add all packages/editor files (index.js, package.json, style.css, types.d.ts)
- This resolves the Vercel build error where @roadmapsh/editor could not be found
